chunks.zh: Safari for macOS KeePass 真是无解了吗？一年一度折腾密码管理器，放弃订阅版 1Password…转到 Strongbox（KeePass）
chunks.en: Is Safari for macOS KeePass really unsolvable? Tossing around password managers once a year, abandoning the subscription version of 1Password... switching to Strongbox (KeePass)

chunks.zh:
Safari for macOS KeePass 真是无解了吗？

一年一度折腾密码管理器，放弃订阅版 1Password…转到 Strongbox （ KeePass ）
折腾经历：
LastPass 免费 1Password6 买断 Bitwarden 免费 enpass 买断 1Password 订阅 Strongbox 免费

iOS 端使用 Strongbox 免费版 没有 FaceID 解锁，能自动填充
Safari 要使用自动填充必须使用 StrongboxPro 版，暂时没找到其他 SafariExtension 插件
Chrome macOS 端 暂时用 KeepassXC 连接
Android 就太多客户端了

大家还有推荐不？
chunks.en:
Is Safari for macOS KeePass really unsolvable?

Tossing around password managers once a year, abandoning the subscription version of 1Password... switching to Strongbox (KeePass)
Tinkering experience:
LastPass free 1Password6 buy-out Bitwarden free enpass buy-out 1Password subscription Strongbox free

iOS uses the free version of Strongbox, no FaceID unlock, can auto-fill
Safari needs to use StrongboxPro version for auto-fill, and I haven't found any other SafariExtension plugins yet
Chrome macOS side temporarily uses KeepassXC to connect
Too many clients on Android

Does anyone else have any recommendations?

chunks.zh: 1password 就一直用，很舒糊
chunks.en: Just keep using 1password, it's comfortable

chunks.zh: bitwarden 社区版 vaultwarden 服务器自建用了 5 年，很安心...
chunks.en: Bitwarden community version vaultwarden server built myself, used for 5 years, very secure...

chunks.zh: https://github.com/1Password/1password-teams-open-source
chunks.en: https://github.com/1Password/1password-teams-open-source

chunks.zh: iOS 用 keepassium ，至于 macOS ，我劝你放弃 safari ，这东西不就是新时代的 IE6 ？
chunks.en: Use keepassium for iOS, as for macOS, I advise you to give up safari, isn't this the new era's IE6?

chunks.zh: 对呀，为什么不持续用 1p
chunks.en: Yeah, why not keep using 1p

chunks.zh: 可以试试系统自带的密码管理器，挺好用的。
chunks.en: You can try the built-in password manager, it's very easy to use.

chunks.zh: @Remember 要是 Safari 真有 IE6 的市占率，厨子怕是做梦都要笑醒
chunks.en: @Remember If Safari really had IE6's market share, the cook would probably wake up laughing in his dreams

chunks.zh: 如果 OP 是 iOS + macOS 的组合，为啥不考虑 Keychain 呢？
chunks.en: If OP is a combination of iOS + macOS, why not consider Keychain?

chunks.zh: i 用户就喜欢折腾工具
chunks.en: i users just like to tinker with tools

chunks.zh: 我是无脑用 bitwarden
chunks.en: I am brainlessly using bitwarden

chunks.zh: @zeal7s @Tink 每年 45 元好像不太值，可是统一体验确实最好@webto 有几台 Android 的机器@Remember iOS 我觉得 Strongbox 很好用 keepassium 还是不太好，直接用本地的 Dropbox ，更新不太及时
chunks.en: @zeal7s @Tink 45 yuan a year doesn't seem worth it, but the unified experience is indeed the best @webto has a few Android machines @Remember iOS I think Strongbox is very easy to use keepassium is still not very good, using local Dropbox directly, updates are not timely

chunks.zh: @wellsc 年前 无聊。。。摸鱼
chunks.en: @wellsc Bored before the new year... lazing around

chunks.zh: 一年 45 还不值？
chunks.en: 45 a year is not worth it?

chunks.zh: 坚守 vaultwarden
chunks.en: Stick to vaultwarden

chunks.zh: @webto #6 有软件许可证，笔记，信用卡，银行卡。这些 Keychain 或者 Chrome 的密码管理搞不上吧
chunks.en: @webto #6 Has software licenses, notes, credit cards, and bank cards. Keychain or Chrome's password management can't handle these, right?

chunks.zh: 我用了 strongboxpro 的订阅，可以达到正常的使用体验。没办法，这钱总归要从哪个口花出去
chunks.en: I subscribed to strongboxpro and can achieve a normal user experience. There's no way around it, this money has to come out of somewhere

chunks.zh: 一年 45 ， 是 $ 还是 ¥ ? @ios
chunks.en: 45 a year, is it $ or ¥? @ios

chunks.zh: @ios #9 每年 45 元也太便宜了，我是每年三十多刀，没有任何优惠
chunks.en: @ios #9 45 yuan a year is too cheap, I pay over thirty dollars a year, without any discounts

chunks.zh: 从 1p 转自建 bitwarden 也很舒服
chunks.en: Switching from 1p to self-built bitwarden is also very comfortable

chunks.zh: @h4wklee macOS 的订阅下不了手 哈哈
chunks.en: @h4wklee macOS subscription is too expensive haha
